sentences.english: Objective To investigate the advantage of natural convalescent factors of Xingcheng Sanatorium.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查興城療養院區自然療養因子的優勢。

sentences.english: Xingcheng, Liaoning, China, on a windy winter afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 中國遼寧興城，一個大風的冬日午後。

sentences.english: The ancient town of Xingcheng was called Ningyuan in the past. It is a well preserved ancient town built in the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 興城古城舊稱寧遠衛城，是一座保存完好的明代古城。

sentences.english: Xingcheng Bohai Sea is the ancient city is also a newly developed tourist resort.
sentences.chinese: 興城是渤海之濱的古城，亦是新開發的旅遊療養勝地。

sentences.english: The city wall is the most intact one of the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 興城城牆是我國現存最完整的一座明代古城。
